page.title: 12WHAT WE DO ON A SUNDAY
page.content: { Mandy I sometimes lie in till 10.00 a.m so does all my family.I let my cat in and take her up stairs so she can sleep with me.Then I get my breakfast and then I get washed and dressed then I go out on my bike with my friends.I have to come in for my dinner at 2.00 p.m.When my dad comes home from the pub we start dinner.But sometimes I have to give dinner to Mr Russell.Then my dad has a sleep in front of the fire. {Helen I get up at 8 o/clock and get dressed and have breakfast and get a wash and then play with Victoria and Joanne. Sometimes I help mum make dinner. After dinner I help to wash up and then go to Sunday school. At Sunday School we sing songs and play games and draw pictures from Bible stories.
